explanation: [0-0] On the left side of the screen is a little boy wearing a blue top and shorts, in the middle is a little girl wearing a striped shirt and pink shorts, and on the right is a man wearing a black hat, a patterned greyish-white top, and plaid shorts. Their bellies are all round and full from their clothes. The three of them are standing in front of a black grid glass door, and the ground is paved with tiles.

[0-2] Following the rhythm of the music, the little boy on the far right of the screen sways from side to side, holding his belly. The little girl in the middle puts her hands on both sides and looks to the right with a smile in her eyes. The man wearing a black hat on the right side of the screen swings his body back and forth with both hands.

[0-2] Following the rhythm of the music, the little boy on the far right of the screen sways from side to side, holding his belly. The little girl in the middle puts her hands on both sides and looks to the right with a smile in her eyes. The man wearing a black hat on the right side of the screen swings his body back and forth with both hands.

[2-8] At this time, a woman with long hair walks out from behind the glass door on the left side of the screen, holding a plate of food in her hand. At the same time, the little boy in the blue shirt lets go of his hand holding his belly and continues to shake his body to the music. The woman standing behind the little boy picks up a piece of food and hands it to the man wearing the hat on the right side of the screen. The man raises his hand to take it. Suddenly, a pile of clothes falls from the little boy in blue, and his originally round belly becomes flat. At this time, the little girl in the middle of the screen turns her head to look at the little boy, and the long-haired woman behind her also stares at the little boy.
